metadata.title: CVE-2018-18511 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-origin images can be read from a canvas element in violation of the same-origin policy using the transferFromImageBitmap method. *Note: This only affects Firefox 65. Previous versions are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 65.0.1.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '65.0.1+build2-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:60.7.0+build1-0ubuntu3').
